Entries.default:
"Captain, a moment?"

You hear the voice of [Specified 0], raised in question, then an insistent knock at your cabin door.

[Specified 0] pokes their head into your quarters and frowns.
"Bring him aboard. I'll meet him on the deck."

[Specified 0] nods, acknowledging your order, and hurries out the door.

You gather your equipment and head out onto the main deck.
[Specified 0] nods sharply and hurries out the door.
"We found a man drifting on a piece of flotsam. The deckhands tried to talk to him, but he's speakin' in a tongue none of us have ever heard before."
"Should we bring him on board, see if we can get a few words of sense outta him? Or would you rather we leave him to his fate?"
